sentences.en: a magazine rack
sentences.cn: 杂志架

sentences.en: a wine rack
sentences.cn: 酒架

sentences.en: Anxiety kept him on the rack.
sentences.cn: 焦虑使他痛苦万分.

sentences.en: Don't think this job a piece of cake. You'll have to rack your brains once you start on it.
sentences.cn: 别以为这工作是易如反掌的事, 你做了就知道它是很伤脑筋的.

sentences.en: For our clothes, we went to a shop on Hollywood Boulevard, and we just picked it all off the rack.
sentences.cn: 至于衣服，我们到好莱坞大道上的一家商店里，都是直接挑现成的买。

sentences.en: Gloria slid an appraising eye over the rest of the rack before reaching for the dress.
sentences.cn: 格洛丽亚以审视的眼光向货架上其余的衣服扫了一遍，才伸手去拿那件连衣裙。

sentences.en: Great sobs racked her body .
sentences.cn: 她哭得全身抽搐。

sentences.en: He went over and took his jacket from the coat rack.
sentences.cn: 到衣架上取外套.

sentences.en: His already infirm body was racked by high fever.
sentences.cn: 他已经很孱弱的身体受到高烧的折磨。

sentences.en: I took the key for the room off a rack above her head.
sentences.cn: 我从她头上方的架子上拿走了房门钥匙。

sentences.en: Invert the cake onto a cooling rack.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕倒扣在冷却架上。

sentences.en: Japan is racking up record trade surpluses with the United States.
sentences.cn: 日本与美国的贸易顺差正在创新高。

sentences.en: John selected a card from the rack.
sentences.cn: 约翰从架子上选了一张贺卡.

sentences.en: My brain is continually on the rack about the means of living.
sentences.cn: 我总是为生计而伤神.

sentences.en: My ingenuity is on the rack to find a good excuse.
sentences.cn: 我正在绞尽脑汁找借口.

sentences.en: My rucksack was too big for the luggage rack.
sentences.cn: 我的背包太大了，行李架上放不下。

sentences.en: rack up points.
sentences.cn: 积累分数

sentences.en: She began to rack her brains to remember what had happened at the nursing home.
sentences.cn: 她开始绞尽脑汁地回忆在疗养院发生的事。

sentences.en: The cough seemed to rack his body.
sentences.cn: 他咳得全身震动.

sentences.en: The old house soon went to rack and ruin.
sentences.cn: 这所旧房子很快就毁坏了.

sentences.en: Turn the cake the right way up on to a wire rack.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕翻到合适的方向对准金属丝架上。

words.tran_cn: 行拷刑者；使人痛苦的人
折磨；使...痛苦；加以拷问（rack的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: go to rack (或 wrack) and ruin
phrases.tran_cn: 走向毁灭，弄得一团糟；陷入失修状态
杂志架；期刊架；书报杂志架
(北美)。 同 off the peg （见 peg）

phrases.phrase: rack (或 wrack) one's brains (或 brain)

phrases.tran_cn: 损坏；毁灭；荒芜；分崩离析
积累；取得（某物，尤指得分，数量）
放葡萄酒的架子；酒架；壁挂酒架

trans.tran_cn: 行李架，支架，刑架，（羊、猪等带前肋的）颈脊
trans.tran_en: a frame or shelf that has bars or hooks on which you can put things

trans.tran_cn: 使痛苦不堪， 使受折磨
trans.tran_en: to make someone suffer great mental or physical pain

trans.tran_cn: 使痛苦，使焦虑，剥削，榨取，用刑拘折磨
trans.tran_en: If someone is racked by something such as illness or anxiety, it causes them great suffering or pain
